LABEL.NAME: Non-Editable Label
LABEL.CAPTION: This label CANNOT%0D%0Abe edited
LABEL.COMMENT: This is an example of a label that is NOT editable even in edit mode.

LABEL.NAME: Editable Label
LABEL.CAPTION: This label CAN%0D%0Abe edited
LABEL.COMMENT: This is an example of a that is editable in edit mode. This is the default behavior.

NOTE.NAME: Editable Note In Non-Editable POI
NOTE.TEXT: This is an example of a note that is not editable even in edit mode because its POI cannot be edited.

LABEL.NAME: Editable Label In Non-Editable POI
LABEL.CAPTION: This label CANNOT%0D%0Abe edited%0D%0Abecause its POI cannot be edited
LABEL.COMMENT: This is an example of a label that is not editable even in edit mode because its POI cannot be edited.
LABEL.TOOLTIP: This label is not editable because of its POI.
